core_meaning: Sextile between Mercury and Sun opens opportunity/skill. Mercury: analysis, communication, commerce, learning, tech. Sun: ego, identity, authority, vitality, purpose, visibility. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Negotiation, analytics, documentation, skilling.  Authority, recognition, leadership, alignment with purpose. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Dialog, problem-solving, curiosity.  Self-respect, healthy boundaries, paternal figures. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Trading, freelancing, multi-stream income, contracts.  Status-linked income, government/authority-linked gains. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Nervous system, breath, routine mobility.  Heart, vitality, heat regulation; consider circadian rhythm. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Sun: lead, present, decide; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
